Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, south of the Evenborough Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The large Evenborough Stables are able to accomodate over one hundred horses at any given time. This is useful when there are large festivals or other meetings in town. On the south side of the road is the Darmanian Memorial, a museum-like preservation of ancient ruins of long dead civilizations.
